user_question: What are the ideal storage conditions for a bottle of 1990 Château Margaux?
final_answer: The ideal storage conditions for a bottle of 1990 Château Margaux are a temperature of 55°F (13°C), humidity of 70%, stored on its side in a dark, vibration-free environment.
